mapper.update:
update user
loginCode = #{logincode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isLogout = #{islogout,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set loginCode = #{logincode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isLogout = #{islogout,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
